create.title: !event create
create.description: Starts the event creation process. Prepare for bot DMs aplenty.

list.title: !event list
list.description: Lists all events for the server (no duplicates for repeat events)

join.title: !event "<event ID>" join
join.description: Marks you as an attendee for the event.

listAttendees.title: !event "<event ID>" listattendees
listAttendees.description: Lists those that are attending the event.

listAssignees.title: !event listassignees for "<task ID>"
listAssignees.description: Lists the assignees for the given task

assign.title: !event assign <@user> to "<task ID>"
assign.description: Assigns the specified user to the specified task. Use 'me' to assign yourself.

task.title: !event "<event ID>" (task | job | assignment) create
task.description: Creates a new task for the specified event.

taskEdit.title: !event "<event ID>" (task | job | assignment) edit "<task ID>"
taskEdit.description: Edits the description of the task

listTasks.title: !event "<event ID>" (jobs | joblist | assignments)
listTasks.description: Lists all the tasks for the given event.

eventEdit.title: !event "<event ID>" edit
eventEdit.description: Starts the event edit process. Prepare for more bot DMs.

delete.title: !event "<event ID>" delete
delete.description: Ruins all the fun for everyone by killing the event
